document.full_text: the european union's embrace of the fragile democracies in the balkans is weaker than at any time in 15 years, prime minister viktor orban of hungary said thursday.
document.title: hungary urges balkan e.u. entry
lines_and_colors: the european union's embrace of the fragile democracies in the balkans is weaker than at any time in 15 years, prime minister viktor orban of hungary said thursday.
